anime.description: Back on the planet Keron, a young http://anidb.net/ch11501 [Keroro] tries to impress Pururu by showing off the Kero Ball, a multifunctional Keronian weapon borrowed by http://anidb.net/ch12064 [Giroro] from his brother http://anidb.net/ch37633 [Garuru]. While testing the buttons, Keroro accidentally transports himself, Pururu, Giroro and http://anidb.net/ch15188 [Dororo] inside the ball, where the four end up in a large-scale pinball simulation. — written by Singan Note: a short 17 minute full 3D CGI movie double billed with http://anidb.net/a4818 [Chou Gekijouban Keroro Gunsou 2 Shinkai no Princess de arimasu!].
